hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Regime Transition from NEUTRAL to STRESS
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a 10% range for 14+ days (low volatility) within NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above/below this range will trigger a volatility expansion where 10-day realized volatility exceeds 80% within 5 trading days of breakout.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended compression periods in crypto typically resolve in explosive moves. Low volatility begets high volatility as pent-up directional pressure releases. Current $86.9K BTC near all-time highs increases binary outcome potential.
entry_conditions: BTC has traded within +/- 5% of a pivot price for 14 consecutive days
Regime is NEUTRAL at time of consolidation

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price returns to consolidation range (false breakout)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but volatility fails to expand (> 80% RV) despite high volume and sustained price movement
